title: Standoff!

meta.alt_txt: learn the total sum of damage from attacks against you that you haven't blocked yet
meta.double_alt_txt: learn the exact damage of every attack against you that you haven't blocked yet
meta.triple_alt_txt: learn the name of every attack against you that you haven't blocked yet
meta.ext_txt: Doesn't provide info for attacks played after this. Damage counts don't include secondary effects.

desc:
[st]

Block 1 attack and learn the total sum of damage from attacks against you that you haven't blocked yet.

~# Doesn't provide info for attacks played after this. Damage counts don't include secondary effects.
